remarks: Define the set of continuous functionals on Hilbert space.  For every "epsilon" ( ` y ` ) there is a "delta" ( ` z ` ) such that... (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-cnfn $p |- ConFn = { t e. ( CC ^m ~H ) | A. x e. ~H A. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. w e. ~H ( ( normh ` ( w -h x ) ) < z -> ( abs ` ( ( t ` w ) - ( t ` x ) ) ) < y ) } $.
$d t w x y z $.
